page.title: 07A Country Walk
page.content: { Weddington Country Walk}was opened in 1983 as part of a derelict land reclamation by{Nuneaton and Bedworth {Borough Council,}funded by the {Department of the Environment.}The walk is approximately one and a half miles along part of the former{Ashby {and Nuneaton Joint Railway Line. } It is a pleasant public walk, informally maintained to conserve the wide range of flora and fauna which has become established. Careful management ensures a balance of species. Future plans aim to link the {River Anker,}canals, footpaths and similar reclaimed land schemes to form a{'Greentrack'}or walkway through Nuneaton to Bedworth.
